scripts.clean:shared:src: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');const d=p.join('..','..','libs','shared','src');if(fs.existsSync(d)){(function w(x){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(x,{withFileTypes:true})){const f=p.join(x,e.name);if(e.isDirectory()) w(f); else if(/\.(js|js\.map|d\.ts)$/.test(f)) fs.rmSync(f)}})(d)}"
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run clean:shared:src && npm run build:shared
scripts.build: npx tsc --showConfig -p tsconfig.build.json > .tsc.out && node -e "const j=require('fs').readFileSync('.tsc.out','utf8');const c=JSON.parse(j);console.log('Resolved @shared/* ->', c.compilerOptions.paths['@shared/*']);" && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.build.json -v && npm run assert:no-alias
scripts.assert:no-alias: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');let bad=[];const w=d=>fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true}).forEach(e=>{const f=p.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory())return w(f);if(f.endsWith('.js')){const s=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');if(s.includes('@shared/')) bad.push(f);}});w('dist');if(bad.length){console.error('Leftover @shared in:',bad);process.exit(1);}else{console.log('âœ” no @shared alias left in dist');}"
